name: The Lost Wet Scrolls
description:
This is a game where you are roming around the dungeos trying to find the scrolls to be able to tell who might have stolen the gold from the bank

use Arrow keys to navigate in the dungeon and the upArrow/SpaceBar key to jump

when ever during the game you feel confident enough to tell who is the robber just click on the blue "accuse" button

the truth is waiting for you go and help the inocents and point out the robber
